# CleanSlate APK Information 
 
App Name: CleanSlate - Secure Data Wiping 
Package Name: com.cleanslate 
Version: 1.0.0 
Build Date: 09-09-2025 17:12:10.07 
 
SECURITY WARNING: 
This application performs irreversible data destruction. 
Data wiped with CleanSlate CANNOT be recovered. 
Always backup important data before using this application. 
 
Features: 
- DoD 5220.22-M secure wiping 
- NIST 800-88 Guidelines 
- Gutmann 35-pass method 
- External device scanning 
- File selection interface 
- Comprehensive warning system 
- Real-time progress tracking
